definition: (of garments) against the skin/to line/lining/to contrast with/to assist financially
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
to enhance by contrast/to set off/to serve as a background in order to bring out the subject with greater brilliance/to serve as a prop/a foil
to set off/to highlight by contrast
to serve as foil to one another

sentences.english: Ribbed trim and removable blue lining at drawstring hood.
sentences.chinese: 羅紋修剪和可移動的藍色襯拉繩罩。

sentences.english: Khaki tote bags and metallic suede clutch bags appeal to you, since you want your accessories to be as eclectic as you are.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布或金屬的小山羊皮裁製手提包都很襯你哦。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對鋅浸出渣揮發窯窯襯破損機理進行了系統研究。

sentences.english: Containers used for packing the glass must be lined with soft padding.
sentences.chinese: 用來包裝這些玻璃的容器必須用軟襯。

sentences.english: Also with white flowers Stipple vines lining in the black for the CD.
sentences.chinese: 也是用白色花卉藤蔓點畫在黑底爲襯的CD上。

sentences.english: A high stiff collar framed his narrow face.
sentences.chinese: 高高的硬領襯着他的窄臉。

sentences.english: Flannel lining and contrasting stitch details.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭絨襯和反襯一針一線的細節。

sentences.english: I found Doyle's camerawork to be lyrical and elegiac .
sentences.chinese: 我發現杜可風的攝影工作是有感覺的和襯歌式的。

sentences.english: We have T-shirts in red for 18 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我們的紅色T恤襯價格是18美元。

sentences.english: Every carton is lined with waterproof material.
sentences.chinese: 每個紙板箱都襯防水材料。

sentences.english: Breathable mesh lining and a cushioned footbed provides all day comfort.
sentences.chinese: 透氣網布襯和墊鞋墊提供整天的舒適感。

sentences.english: Simple cuboidal epithelium lining a tubule (longitudinal cut).
sentences.chinese: 單層立方上皮襯於管腔內。

sentences.english: He put it into his vest pocket, threw off his coat and pulled up his shirt sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 他將花放進口袋，迅速脫下大衣，挽起了襯衣袖。

sentences.english: Inspect the front brake pads and rear brake linings.
sentences.chinese: 檢查前剎車墊和後剎車襯。

sentences.english: A yoke insert for a low-necked dress.
sentences.chinese: 抵肩襯在低領衣服裏的抵肩。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
